name: The Waiting Room ALPHA V0.02
description:
Spent 3 days working on this game for offline chat. 

PLAYER CAP IS 60!

It's only been 3 days so pretty basic but in the future i'm planning on doing weekly cool events with this with offline chat and maybe connect other offline chats with it.

Have fun everyone for now all you can do is roam around and talk to the people in the game and also select from the 6 characters :)

NOTE: There has been reports of crashes it is assumed if you have too high ping it will disconnect you. (crash your game)

-Jimbobgaming
